name: Great Fly Invasion!
description:
In the depths, the ever-devouring creatures spawn with one intent. Their new form bursts forth from their carcasses to spread their ilk. It is up to you, armed with a single flyswatter, to stop their spread before they overcome you with mindless buzzing.

The Great Fly Invasion is a casual game where you attempt to kill all the flies in the garbage as they spawn and keep them from laying more eggs.

Key Features

  • You can swat flies
